text: Billy Tang Hin-Shing () (died 2 July 2020) was a Hong Kong movie director. He began working as an assistant director for Asia Television. He was known for directing Dr. Lamb, Those Were the Days... and Dial D for Demons. Tang died of nasopharynx cancer on 2 July 2020, aged 69.Hong Kong director Billy Tang dead at age 69 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Chinese movie directors Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from nasopharynx cancer
title: Billy Tang
